long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An AI Text Generator can be described as a sophisticated technology that integrates the application of natural language processing (NLP) and artificial intelligence to generate content that is articulate, purposeful and interesting-in any area of discourse whatsoever. 

Articles, essays, codes, social media posts and many others are some of the writing tasks that these AI's are most commonly used for. Whereas this generator is context and style sensitive, which usually ensures quality produced is high and time cost is minimal.
